name: The Blight of Thornmouth
description:
Created in 48 hours for #kenneyjam 2021! This is the post-jam version with some additional features and fixes.

Theme: Rotation

The village of Thornmouth has come under a mysterious infection transforming the residents into giant man-eating insects.  Doctors Monroe, Sanders, and Archer must use their unique skills to deduce and eliminate the infected before the whole town succumbs to the illness.

Each Doctor has various advantages and disadvantages, however being in the town risks them catching infection, so they must rotate out to rest and recover.

Monroe: Doctor Monroe has no weapons, but can interrogate villagers with found evidence to root out their true identities. Have him talk to suspects.

Sanders: Doctor Sanders wields an axe that can be used to clear passageways and attack at a very close range.

Archer: Doctor Archer wields a pistol solely used to attack at a distance. The pistol provides no other utility.
